title: Foxworth Friday: 'NBA 75', Deshaun Watson to Miami? Also, Simmons updates
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the "NBA 75" and how every company knows what their lists do (0:27). Plus, how the Sixers are handling the Ben Simmons situation (11:22) and the recent trade rumors surrounding Deshaun Watson (34:47).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
